**Checks:**

* [ ] I have run `go fmt ./...`

* [ ] I have run `go mod tidy` for all modules

* [ ] I have followed **camelCase** and **PascalCase** correctly throughout my code

* [ ] I have handled errors properly

**What type of change are you bringing in this PR?**
- [ ] Backend changes
- [ ] UI changes
- [ ] Other
